tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geofencing_areas (
  area_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  area_name VARCHAR(255),
  latitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
  longitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
  radius DOUBLE PRECISION
);

CREATE TABLE GameEvents (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  event_description TEXT,
  area_id INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_area_id FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES GeofenceAreas(area_id)
);

CREATE TABLE events (
  event_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  trigger_geofence_id INT NOT NULL,
  event_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE player_challenges (
  challenge_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT NOT NULL,
  challenge_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  challenge_difficulty INT NOT NULL,
  completed BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE
);

CREATE TABLE player_progress (
  player_id INT REFERENCES players(player_id),
  event_id INT REFERENCES events(event_id),
  challenge_id INT REFERENCES challenges(challenge_id),
  players_completed_challenge BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  PRIMARY KEY (player_id, event_id, challenge_id)
);
